Message:
When she showed
our parents her magic,
they threw her out of the house.

“Filthy witch.
I hope you die
out there,” they spat.

If everyone says that
witches are evil,
then they must be evil.
When I ran out of the house,

I saw Sol curled up on
the ground crying.
You can’t make her cry like this.

Together with the stuffed bear
I had brought with me,
I pulled Sol into a tight hug.

Even if you’re an evil witch,
you’re still my dear little sister.

Slowly, Sol’s eyes welled up
with more tears—

tears that were much warmer
than the ones before.

And as they slowly rolled down
her face, she let out loud sobs
in my arms.
